name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a dedicated Staff Software Engineer with 8 years of experience, I excel in **AI**, **Machine Learning**, and **Data Analysis** to drive product development and innovation. My strong technical expertise in **Java**, combined with proficiency in clean and scalable code practices, ensures the creation of high-quality solutions. I have a proven track record collaborating with cross-functional teams to enhance overall project outcomes. Additionally, I possess experience with analytics tools such as **Amplitude** and **Looker**, alongside advanced skills in **Excel** for effective data-driven decision-making.

Leveraging my full stack development skills across **JavaScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**, I have successfully built robust solutions in the healthcare and financial sectors, utilizing frameworks like **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. With extensive cloud experience on **Azure** and **AWS**, I develop enterprise-grade platforms that integrate predictive analytics and intelligent automation. My foundation in microservices architecture and CI/CD automation further allows me to deliver secure applications compliant with industry standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS, all while coaching and mentoring junior developers.
